Articles.Content:
First attempt at a buggy and now I am hooked, not sure what kind of buggy to make next.... hmmm...

seeing as I have owned the game for over a year and yet to land on a planet or moon , my short attention span just wonders off and I start making random stuff.... would be nice to land, but even after watching how, and trying I still cant seem to get a smooth shot to the mun, end up wasting most my rocket just getting the trajectory lined up.... Any tips ... like real tips.... lololol.. on another note THIS BUGGY IS AWESOME, handles well and goes pretty damn quick... Think I am gunna start recording... Ive done war thunder and other stuff... but KSP I have not recorded.... so may start making a youtube habbit out of it .... New to the forum world

Edited January 24, 2014 by vexx32
Please avoid profanity in future. The forums are intended to be family-friendly.
